meta_description: View Current Exhibits and Weekly Events, Purchase Admissions, Book Birthday Parties. The Monmouth Museum in Middletown, NJ
hours_text:
# PLAN YOUR VISIT

HOURS

Open Tuesdays - Sundays

10:00am - 4:00pm

Mondays Closed

ADDRESS

765 Newman Springs Rd., Lincroft, NJ 07738 

on Brookdale Community College campus

Follow signs to Parking Lot 1

# ADMISSION

$15

General Admission

[Members ](https://www.monmouthmuseum.org/membership)

Free

Free

Under 2 Years old

Free

Brookdale Student (w/ ID)

Active Military (w/ ID)

Free

65 and up (w/ ID)

$10

[Group Rate ](https://www.monmouthmuseum.org/tours)

Varies

[GET TICKETS ](https://purchase.monmouthmuseum.org/GeneralAdmission.aspx)

Reservations can be made online for members and non-members. Having your reservation confirmation on your phone helps a line move faster! The reservation "time slot" helps our team but your reservation is good for the whole day. You can come anytime during operating hours.​

You can also purchase tickets for admission at the front desk. We encourage guests to check our Instagram page for the latest updates. During the week, we can have a wing closure due to a school tour. We also have weeks where the galleries are closed for installation. It's best to check in advance!

Entry to the Monmouth Museum is FREE for children under the age of 2, Brookdale employees, Brookdale current students, and Active Military. 

  * ​Brookdale employees and current students must show a valid ID at the front desk. Tickets cannot be reserved in advance.​

  * Active Duty Military must show a valid military ID at the front desk. Tickets cannot be reserv...

## Welcome to Monmouth Museum

The Monmouth Museum, a museum of ideas, presents changing art, history, and science exhibitions to educate and entertain while providing a destination for creative expression and life-long learning to the diverse community we serve.

[PLAN YOUR VISIT ](https://www.monmouthmuseum.org/admission)

## HOURS of operation

## Open Tuesdays - Sundays: 10am - 4pm  
Mondays Closed  
Check below for hours of operation for each wing

# current exhibitions
